titles.title: Gases and temperatures of fumaroles of Tuyla (Klyuchevskoy, Russia) in 1938

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This is a summary of fumarole gas analyses from Tuyla crater from 1937 and 1938. Gases were collected by S.I. Naboko and I.Z. Ivanov of the USSR Science Academy, and analyzed by S.I Naboko at the Kamchatka Volcanology Station. Table 2 gases are detects only with no associated values, only orders of magnitude determined from sulphuric acid acid reaction rates.
Volcanic Gas, Volatiles, Fumarole Gas, Volcanic emissions, Volcanoes, Gas chemistry

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: Russia, Kamchatka, Klyuchev, Klyuchevskaya, Klyuchevskoy Volcano, Tuyla Crater
